snippet: The Bridge Project — that ambitious British-American exercise in cross-pollination — is winding down its third and final season, but it’s not likely that its absence will leave a gaping hole in anyone’s cultural calendar.
abstract: Bridge Project, an ambitious British-American exercise in theatrical cross-pollination, is winding down its third and final season, but it’s not likely that its absence will leave a gaping hole in anyone’s cultural calendar; project's appearances were sporadic and never meant to be a long-lasting venture.
lead_paragraph: The Bridge Project — that ambitious British-American exercise in cross-pollination — is winding down its third and final season, but it’s not likely that its absence will leave a gaping hole in anyone’s cultural calendar.

headline.seo: Bridge Project, Kevin Spacey and Sam Mendes Take Final Bow
headline.main: A Project That Bridged More Than Accents
headline.print_headline: A Project That Bridged More Than Accents
